001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
005
006/**
007 * Placeholder persistence adapter used until legacy sinks are migrated.
008 * <p>Thread-safe and stateless; satisfies {@link PersistencePort} when persistence is disabled.
009 *
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public final class NoOpPersistenceAdapter implements PersistencePort {
013  /**
014   * Discards the provided pair.
015   *
016   * @param pair ignored; may be {@code null}
017   * @implNote Callers typically replace this adapter with a real persistence sink.
018   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
019   */
020  @Override
021  public void persist(MessagePair pair) {
022    // Intentionally no-op for initial scaffolding.
023  }
024}
025
026
027
